name: evolvcfs
description: This is a "first stab" at develping a helper function library for developing Evolv-CS Forms.

scripts.build_z: del-cli lib/*.min.js && babel src -d lib && rname -r "(?<fname>[a-zA-Z_]*).*" lib/*.js "{{fname}}.min.js"
scripts.forms: del-cli forms_min/*.min.js && babel forms -d forms_min && rname -r "(?<fname>[a-zA-Z_]*).*" forms_min/*.js "{{fname}}.min.js"
scripts.other: del-cli misc_min/*.min.js && babel misc -d misc_min && rname -r "(?<fname>[a-zA-Z_]*).*" misc_min/*.js "{{fname}}.min.js"

author: George Rivera
